jdbcService.sql: select s.id, s.created, s.modified, s.target, s.schedule, s.until, s.amount, s.allow_overlap, s.task, s.task_type, s.task_input, s.enabled, s.manual from task_schedules s join task_queue_schedules q on q.task_schedule_id = s.id where q.task_queue_id = :queueId and s.enabled = true and s.manual = :manual
